title: HOW ARE YOU TODAY??
body:
Just want to know how you guys are feeling today?!
Tell down in the comments{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
You want to know how I'm doing?  https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/187112/2.0  Thank you for asking!  

It's my Friday so I'm pretty stoked for the upcoming weekend of marathoning Tekken 7.  I might even go camping, which will be interesting for me as I prefer my creature comforts.  :D  Broporo will be around, though, so be sure to poke the poro!  How are you doing, Marin?  Hope your day is mighty! :D
Porocles your cutie levels are off the charts. Hope you enjoy your weekend bud.

Eh I've had a bit of a rough start today, but I'll be much better now that I'm here with mah poro-bros ^_^! Definitely looking forward to getting home and playing more FF14 after I just resubbed. 

DISCLAIMER: Poke Poros at your own risk {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:11}}
